objective: 2 points for each secondary diagonal of cards belonging to the fungi kingdom.
2 points for each main diagonal of cards belonging to the plant kingdom.
2 points for each secondary diagonal of cards belonging to the animal kingdom.
2 points for each main diagonal of cards belonging to the insect kingdom.
3 points for each pile of cards belonging to the fungi kingdom that starts from the top-left corner of a card belonging to the plant kingdom.
3 points for each pile of cards belonging to the plant kingdom that starts from the top-right corner of a card belonging to the insect kingdom.
3 points for each pile of cards belonging to the animal kingdom that starts from the bottom-left corner of a card belonging to the fungi kingdom.
3 points for each pile of cards belonging to the insect kingdom that starts from the bottom-right corner of a card belonging to the animal kingdom.
2 points for each set consisting of 3 fungi resources visible in the playing area.
2 points for each set consisting of 3 plant resources visible in the playing area.
2 points for each set consisting of 3 animal resources visible in the playing area.
2 points for each set consisting of 3 insect resources visible in the playing area.
3 points for each set consisting of quill, inkwell and manuscript visible in the playing area.
2 points for each pair of manuscripts visible in the playing area.
2 points for each pair of inkwells visible in the playing area.
2 points for each pair of quills visible in the playing area.
